subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn and Marcel Hirscher of Austria ended their best World Cup seasons as overall champions, though neither finished on a high note in Schladming, Austria.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn and Marcel Hirscher of Austria ended their best World Cup seasons as overall champions, though neither finished on a high note in Schladming, Austria.
